name: Shogun: Total War
description:
Shogun: Total War is a strategy game developed by Electronic Arts and Daydream Software. It came out on 13-06-2000. Electronic Arts published the game. On review aggregator Metacritic, Shogun: Total War has a score of 84. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Shogun: Total War is available on PC.
